TEXT.TITLE: DEAN FOODS <DF> PICKS CHIEF EXECUTIVE
TEXT.BODY: Dean Foods Co said its board elected Howard M. Dean, the company's president, to succeed Kenneth J. Douglas as chief executive officer of the firm. Kenneth will replace Douglas, who is also chairman, on October one, Douglas' 65th birthday. Douglas will remain chairman. Reuter
